data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Khimki with the kick-off.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Khimki.
Khimki's Arseni Logashov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Khimki.
Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin has been booked in Khimki.
In the minute 9, Khimki push forward at Arena Khimki and Ilya Kukharchuk gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Spartak Moscow defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Arena Khimki.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 14, In Khimki Khimki attack through Vladimir Dyadyun. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Khimki defenders.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 21, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Reziuan Mirzov for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 26, In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Reziuan Mirzov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Khimki's Denis Glushakov gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 27, Khimki are whistled for offside.
Ilya Kukharchuk gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
Ilya Kukharchuk for Khimki drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki.
At Arena Khimki, Pavel Maslov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 32, Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Spartak Moscow's Nail Umyarov breaks free at Arena Khimki. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kirill Levnikov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Reziuan Mirzov for Khimki has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
Khimki attack but Vladimir Dyadyun's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khimki's Denis Glushakov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
In the minute 44, Brian Idowu for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Spartak Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Arena Khimki.
Spartak Moscow kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Khimki throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Reziuan Mirzov puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 48, Ilya Kukharchuk with an assist there.
Spartak Moscow push upfield but Kirill Levnikov quickly pulls them for offside.
Alex Kral of Spartak Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, Kirill Levnikov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Ilya Kukharchuk (Khimki) has received a yellow card from Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Spartak Moscow push upfield and Ezequiel Ponce gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Khimki defence.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 55, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ezequiel Ponce.
Victor Moses is replacing Nail Umyarov for Spartak Moscow at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 57, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Spartak Moscow.
Khimki's Arseni Logashov has been booked in Khimki.
Aleksandr Kokorin scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Ezequiel Ponce is back on his feet again.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 61, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow move into a 1-2 lead through a Ezequiel Ponce header.
In the minute 63, Ayrton Lucas instrumental with a fine assist.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 69, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Khimki push forward at Arena Khimki and Reziuan Mirzov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 70, Aleksandr Kokorin is booked for the away team.
Igor Cherevchenko (Khimki) is making a first substitution, with Mohamed Konate replacing Ilya Kukharchuk.
Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's second substitution at Arena Khimki with Danil Lipovoy replacing Vladimir Dyadyun.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in Khimki.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 74, Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In Khimki, Spartak Moscow push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 76, Khimki's Brian Idowu gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Khimki, Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 77, Goal! Spartak Moscow extend their lead to 1-3 through Jordan Larsson.
Spartak Moscow pushes forward through Ezequiel Ponce, whose finish on goal is saved.
Khimki are coming forward and Reziuan Mirzov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Important block from the Spartak Moscow defence as Reziuan Mirzov fires in a strike for Khimki.
Khimki are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Aleksandr Kokorin with Stepan Hovhannisyan. This is the second substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
Spartak Moscow's Victor Moses gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 82, Kirill Levnikov signals a Khimki throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
In the minute 83, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 85, Brian Idowu keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-3.
That's a fine assist from Mohamed Konate.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 86, Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Khimki's area.
Denis Glushakov for Khimki has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 88, Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's third substitution at Arena Khimki with Pavel Mogilevets replacing Aleksandr Troshechkin.
In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Brian Idowu. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In Khimki, Egor Danilkin (Khimki) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-3.
At Arena Khimki, Egor Danilkin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Igor Cherevchenko (Khimki) is making a fourth substitution, with Aleksandr Dolgov replacing Evgeni Gapon.
Dmitry Markitesov is replacing Roman Zobnin for the away team.
Spartak Moscow make their fourth substitution with Andrey Eshchenko replacing Pavel Maslov.
